verses.verse: אִ֛ישׁ <WH376> There was a man הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> become בְאֶֽרֶץ־ <WH776> in the land ע֖וּץ <WH5780> of Uz אִיּ֣וֹב <WH347> [was] Job שְׁמ֑וֹ <WH8034> whose name וְהָיָ֣ה ׀ <WH1961> become הָאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> and that man הַה֗וּא <WH1931> he תָּ֧ם <WH8535> was perfect וְיָשָׁ֛ר <WH3477> and upright וִירֵ֥א <WH3373> and one that feared אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> God וְסָ֥ר <WH5493> and eschewed מֵרָֽע׃ <WH7451> evil
וַיִּוָּ֥לְדוּ <WH3205> And there were born ל֛וֹ שִׁבְעָ֥ה <WH7651> unto him seven בָנִ֖ים <WH1121> sons וְשָׁל֥וֹשׁ <WH7969> and three בָּנֽוֹת׃ <WH1323> daughters

וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> become מִ֠קְנֵהוּ <WH4735> His substance שִֽׁבְעַ֨ת <WH7651> also was seven אַלְפֵי־ <WH505> thousand צֹ֜אן <WH6629> sheep וּשְׁלֹ֧שֶׁת <WH7969> and three אַלְפֵ֣י <WH505> thousand גְמַלִּ֗ים <WH1581> camels וַחֲמֵ֨שׁ <WH2568> and five מֵא֤וֹת <WH3967> hundred צֶֽמֶד־ <WH6776> yoke בָּקָר֙ <WH1241> of oxen וַחֲמֵ֣שׁ <WH2568> and five מֵא֣וֹת <WH3967> hundred אֲתוֹנ֔וֹת <WH860> she asses וַעֲבֻדָּ֖ה <WH5657> household רַבָּ֣ה <WH7227> great מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> and a very וַיְהִי֙ <WH1961> become הָאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> so that this man הַה֔וּא <WH1931> he גָּד֖וֹל <WH1419> was the greatest מִכָּל־ <WH3605> of all בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> of all the men קֶֽדֶם׃ <WH6924> of the east

וְהָלְכ֤וּ <WH1980> went בָנָיו֙ <WH1121> And his sons וְעָשׂ֣וּ <WH6213> and hold מִשְׁתֶּ֔ה <WH4960> A feast בֵּ֖ית <WH1004> [in their] houses אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> every one יוֹמ֑וֹ <WH3117> his day וְשָׁלְח֗וּ <WH7971> and sent וְקָרְאוּ֙ <WH7121> and called לִשְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <WH7969> for their three [אַחְיֹתֵיהֶם כ] (אַחְיֹֽותֵיהֶ֔ם <WH269> other ק) לֶאֱכֹ֥ל <WH398> to eat וְלִשְׁתּ֖וֹת <WH8354> and to drink עִמָּהֶֽם׃ <WH5973> with

וַיְהִ֡י <WH1961> become כִּ֣י <WH3588> When הִקִּיפֽוּ֩ <WH5362> were gone about יְמֵ֨י <WH3117> And it was so when the days הַמִּשְׁתֶּ֜ה <WH4960> of [their] feasting וַיִּשְׁלַ֧ח <WH7971> sent אִיּ֣וֹב <WH347> that Job וַֽיְקַדְּשֵׁ֗ם <WH6942> and sanctified וְהִשְׁכִּ֣ים <WH7925> them and rose up early בַּבֹּקֶר֮ <WH1242> in the morning וְהֶעֱלָ֣ה <WH5927> and offered עֹלוֹת֮ <WH5930> burnt offerings מִסְפַּ֣ר <WH4557> [according] to the number כֻּלָּם֒ <WH3605> all כִּ֚י <WH3588> When אָמַ֣ר <WH559> said אִיּ֔וֹב <WH347> of them all for Job אוּלַי֙ <WH194> It may be חָטְא֣וּ <WH2398> have sinned בָנַ֔י <WH1121> that my sons וּבֵרֲכ֥וּ <WH1288> and cursed אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> God בִּלְבָבָ֑ם <WH3824> in their hearts כָּ֛כָה <WH3602> Thus יַעֲשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> Thus did אִיּ֖וֹב <WH347> Job כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַיָּמִֽים׃ <WH3117> continually פ

וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> now there was הַיּ֔וֹם <WH3117> Now there was a day וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <WH935> came בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> when the sons הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> of God לְהִתְיַצֵּ֖ב <WH3320> to present עַל־ <WH5921> before יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> themselves before the LORD וַיָּב֥וֹא <WH935> came גַֽם־ <WH1571> also הַשָּׂטָ֖ן <WH7854> and Satan בְּתוֹכָֽם׃ <WH8432> also among

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֛ה <WH3069> God אֶל־ <WH413> to הַשָּׂטָ֖ן <WH7854> unto Satan מֵאַ֣יִן <WH370> Whence תָּבֹ֑א <WH935> comest וַיַּ֨עַן <WH6030> answered הַשָּׂטָ֤ן <WH7854> thou? Then Satan אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָה֙ <WH3069> God וַיֹּאמַ֔ר <WH559> and said מִשּׁ֣וּט <WH7751> From going to and fro בָּאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> in the earth וּמֵֽהִתְהַלֵּ֖ךְ <WH1980> and from walking up and down בָּֽהּ׃

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to הַשָּׂטָ֔ן <WH7854> unto Satan הֲשַׂ֥מְתָּ <WH7760> appoint לִבְּךָ֖ <WH3820> care for עַל־ <WH5921> and עַבְדִּ֣י <WH5650> my servant אִיּ֑וֹב <WH347> Job כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אֵ֤ין <WH369> is no כָּמֹ֙הוּ֙ <WH3644> like בָּאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> that [there is] none like him in the earth אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> man תָּ֧ם <WH8535> a perfect וְיָשָׁ֛ר <WH3477> and an upright יְרֵ֥א <WH3373> one that feareth אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> God וְסָ֥ר <WH5493> and escheweth מֵרָֽע׃ <WH7451> evil

וַיַּ֧עַן <WH6030> answered הַשָּׂטָ֛ן <WH7854> Then Satan אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <WH559> and said הַֽחִנָּ֔ם <WH2600> free יָרֵ֥א <WH3372> fear אִיּ֖וֹב <WH347> Doth Job אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> God

הֲלֹֽא־ <WH3808> not [אַתְּ כ] (אַ֠תָּה <WH859> you ק) שַׂ֣כְתָּ <WH7753> Hast not thou made an hedge בַעֲד֧וֹ <WH1157> about him and about וּבְעַד־ <WH1157> about בֵּית֛וֹ <WH1004> his house וּבְעַ֥ד <WH1157> about כָּל־ <WH3605> and all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after ל֖וֹ מִסָּבִ֑יב <WH5439> every מַעֲשֵׂ֤ה <WH4639> the work יָדָיו֙ <WH3027> of his hands בֵּרַ֔כְתָּ <WH1288> abundantly וּמִקְנֵ֖הוּ <WH4735> and his substance פָּרַ֥ץ <WH6555> is increased בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> in the land

וְאוּלָם֙ <WH199> But שְֽׁלַֽח־ <WH7971> put forth נָ֣א <WH4994> now יָֽדְךָ֔ <WH3027> thine hand וְגַ֖ע <WH5060> now and touch בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after ל֑וֹ אִם־ <WH518> lo לֹ֥א <WH3808> not עַל־ <WH5921> and פָּנֶ֖יךָ <WH6440> thee to thy face יְבָרֲכֶֽךָּ׃ <WH1288> curse

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to הַשָּׂטָ֗ן <WH7854> unto Satan הִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> Behold כָל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after לוֹ֙ בְּיָדֶ֔ךָ <WH3027> Behold all that he hath [is] in thy power רַ֣ק <WH7535> but אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> about אַל־ <WH408> not תִּשְׁלַ֖ח <WH7971> only upon himself put not forth יָדֶ֑ךָ <WH3027> thine hand וַיֵּצֵא֙ <WH3318> went forth הַשָּׂטָ֔ן <WH7854> So Satan מֵעִ֖ם <WH5973> from פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> from the presence יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וַיְהִ֖י <WH1961> become הַיּ֑וֹם <WH3117> And there was a day וּבָנָ֨יו <WH1121> when his sons וּבְנֹתָ֤יו <WH1323> and his daughters אֹֽכְלִים֙ <WH398> [were] eating וְשֹׁתִ֣ים <WH8354> and drinking יַ֔יִן <WH3196> wine בְּבֵ֖ית <WH1004> house אֲחִיהֶ֥ם <WH251> brother's הַבְּכֽוֹר׃ <WH1060> in their eldest

וּמַלְאָ֛ךְ <WH4397> a messenger בָּ֥א <WH935> And there came אֶל־ <WH413> to אִיּ֖וֹב <WH347> unto Job וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <WH559> and said הַבָּקָר֙ <WH1241> The oxen הָי֣וּ <WH1961> become חֹֽרְשׁ֔וֹת <WH2790> were plowing וְהָאֲתֹנ֖וֹת <WH860> and the asses רֹע֥וֹת <WH7462> feeding עַל־ <WH5921> and יְדֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH3027> beside

וַתִּפֹּ֤ל <WH5307> fell שְׁבָא֙ <WH7614> And the Sabeans וַתִּקָּחֵ֔ם <WH3947> [upon them] and took them away וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַנְּעָרִ֖ים <WH5288> the servants הִכּ֣וּ <WH5221> yea they have slain לְפִי־ <WH6310> with the edge חָ֑רֶב <WH2719> of the sword וָֽאִמָּ֨לְטָ֧ה <WH4422> and I only am escaped רַק־ <WH7535> but אֲנִ֛י <WH589> I לְבַדִּ֖י <WH905> alone לְהַגִּ֥יד <WH5046> alone to tell לָֽךְ׃

ע֣וֹד ׀ <WH5750> was still זֶ֣ה <WH2088> another מְדַבֵּ֗ר <WH1696> While he [was] yet speaking וְזֶה֮ <WH2088> another בָּ֣א <WH935> there came וַיֹּאמַר֒ <WH559> also another and said אֵ֣שׁ <WH784> The fire אֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> of God נָֽפְלָה֙ <WH5307> is fallen מִן־ <WH4480> from הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> from heaven וַתִּבְעַ֥ר <WH1197> and hath burned up בַּצֹּ֛אן <WH6629> the sheep וּבַנְּעָרִ֖ים <WH5288> and the servants וַתֹּאכְלֵ֑ם <WH398> and consumed וָאִמָּ֨לְטָ֧ה <WH4422> them and I only am escaped רַק־ <WH7535> but אֲנִ֛י <WH589> I לְבַדִּ֖י <WH905> alone לְהַגִּ֥יד <WH5046> alone to tell לָֽךְ׃

ע֣וֹד ׀ <WH5750> was still זֶ֣ה <WH2088> another מְדַבֵּ֗ר <WH1696> While he [was] yet speaking וְזֶה֮ <WH2088> another בָּ֣א <WH935> there came וַיֹּאמַר֒ <WH559> also another and said כַּשְׂדִּ֞ים <WH3778> The Chaldeans שָׂ֣מוּ ׀ <WH7760> made out שְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <WH7969> three רָאשִׁ֗ים <WH7218> bands וַֽיִּפְשְׁט֤וּ <WH6584> and fell עַל־ <WH5921> on הַגְּמַלִּים֙ <WH1581> upon the camels וַיִּקָּח֔וּם <WH3947> and have carried them away וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַנְּעָרִ֖ים <WH5288> the servants הִכּ֣וּ <WH5221> yea and slain לְפִי־ <WH6310> with the edge חָ֑רֶב <WH2719> of the sword וָאִמָּ֨לְטָ֧ה <WH4422> and I only am escaped רַק־ <WH7535> but אֲנִ֛י <WH589> I לְבַדִּ֖י <WH905> alone לְהַגִּ֥יד <WH5046> alone to tell לָֽךְ׃

עַ֚ד <WH5704> against זֶ֣ה <WH2088> another מְדַבֵּ֔ר <WH1696> While he [was] yet speaking וְזֶ֖ה <WH2088> another בָּ֣א <WH935> there came וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <WH559> also another and said בָּנֶ֨יךָ <WH1121> Thy sons וּבְנוֹתֶ֤יךָ <WH1323> and thy daughters אֹֽכְלִים֙ <WH398> [were] eating וְשֹׁתִ֣ים <WH8354> and drinking יַ֔יִן <WH3196> wine בְּבֵ֖ית <WH1004> house אֲחִיהֶ֥ם <WH251> brother's הַבְּכֽוֹר׃ <WH1060> in their eldest

וְהִנֵּה֩ <WH2009> and behold ר֨וּחַ <WH7307> wind גְּדוֹלָ֜ה <WH1419> a great בָּ֣אָה ׀ <WH935> And behold there came מֵעֵ֣בֶר <WH5676> from הַמִּדְבָּ֗ר <WH4057> the wilderness וַיִּגַּע֙ <WH5060> and smote בְּאַרְבַּע֙ <WH702> the four פִּנּ֣וֹת <WH6438> corners הַבַּ֔יִת <WH1004> of the house וַיִּפֹּ֥ל <WH5307> and it fell עַל־ <WH5921> on הַנְּעָרִ֖ים <WH5288> upon the young men וַיָּמ֑וּתוּ <WH4191> and they are dead וָאִמָּ֨לְטָ֧ה <WH4422> and I only am escaped רַק־ <WH7535> but אֲנִ֛י <WH589> I לְבַדִּ֖י <WH905> alone לְהַגִּ֥יד <WH5046> alone to tell לָֽךְ׃

וַיָּ֤קָם <WH6965> arose אִיּוֹב֙ <WH347> Then Job וַיִּקְרַ֣ע <WH7167> and rent אֶת־ <WH853> מְעִל֔וֹ <WH4598> his mantle וַיָּ֖גָז <WH1494> and shaved אֶת־ <WH853> רֹאשׁ֑וֹ <WH7218> his head וַיִּפֹּ֥ל <WH5307> and fell down אַ֖רְצָה <WH776> upon the ground וַיִּשְׁתָּֽחוּ׃ <WH7812> and worshipped

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <WH559> And said עָרֹ֨ם <WH6174> Naked [יָצָתִי כ] (יָצָ֜אתִי <WH3318> after ק) מִבֶּ֣טֶן <WH990> womb אִמִּ֗י <WH517> of my mother's וְעָרֹם֙ <WH6174> and naked אָשׁ֣וּב <WH7725> shall I return שָׁ֔מָה <WH8033> there יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> thither the LORD נָתַ֔ן <WH5414> gave וַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> and the LORD לָקָ֑ח <WH3947> hath taken away יְהִ֛י <WH1961> become שֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> be the name יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD מְבֹרָֽךְ׃ <WH1288> blessed

בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all זֹ֖את <WH2063> likewise לֹא־ <WH3808> nor חָטָ֣א <WH2398> sinned אִיּ֑וֹב <WH347> In all this Job וְלֹא־ <WH3808> nor נָתַ֥ן <WH5414> not nor charged תִּפְלָ֖ה <WH8604> foolishly לֵאלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> God פ
